Â© The Metropolitan Museum of Art. Image source: Art Resource, NY

In the fresco shown, overlapping forms and architectural elements are used to create the effect of

choices.label: illusionistic spatial depth beyond the wall
a dynamic composition devoid of negative space
flat, solid forms that emphasize the surface texture of the wall

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
